content=The hotel is 200 metres from the sea and in centre but still, its complete absence of noises and its big garden welcomes you in a very peaceful and dreamy environment.

content=Il Bottaccio is an elegant hotel and a superb restaurant created around a seventeenth century water-powered olive mill transformed into an oasis of refinement and serenity.This aristocratic rural retreat stands isolated in the hills of Montignoso, enjoing both the reflection of the Mediterranean Sea and the peace of Apuanian Alps.
address=Via C. Duilio, 6 - 55042 Forte dei Marmi

content=The Hotel Astor Victoria offers you exclusive environments and impeccable services in 3 star accommodation in an enviable location: 100 metres from the beach and 400 metres from the town centre of Forte dei Marmi, in the Roma Imperiale area.
content=Principe Forte dei Marmi on the Tuscan Riviera is the hotel Principe of choice for luxurious accommodations in beautiful Versilia on Italy's north western seacoast.
